targets.rawSql: SELECT MAX(time) as "time" FROM covid19 WHERE country_name = '$country'

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  death,
  recovered,
  confirmed-death-recovered "active"
FROM covid19
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country_name = '$country'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  confirmed-death-recovered AS "active",
  death,
  recovered
FROM covid19
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country_name = '$country'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1d),
  confirmed - lag(confirmed) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) as "confirmed",
  death - lag(death) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) as "death",
  recovered - lag(recovered) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) as "recovered"
FROM covid19
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND 
  country_name = '$country' 
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1d),
  avg(death) - lag(avg(death)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) AS "death",
  avg(recovered) - lag(avg(recovered)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) AS "recovered",
  avg(confirmed) - lag(avg(confirmed)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) AS "confirmed"
FROM covid19
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country_name = '$country'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",1d),
  avg(death) - lag(avg(death)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) AS "death",
  avg(confirmed) - lag(avg(confirmed)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup("time",1d)) AS "confirmed"
FROM covid19
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country_name = '$country'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  death,
  recovered,
  confirmed-death-recovered AS "active"
FROM covid19
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  country_name = '$country'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  a.country_name AS "Country",
  a.confirmed / b.population AS "confirmed"
FROM covid19 a, population b
WHERE
  a.country_name = '$country' AND
  a.country_code = b.country_code AND
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  a.country_name AS "Country",
  a.confirmed / b.population AS "confirmed"
FROM covid19 a, population b
WHERE
  a.country_code in ('BE', 'US', 'NL', 'MY', 'DE', 'FR', 'IT', 'ES') AND
  a.country_code = b.country_code AND
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  a.country_name AS "Country",
  a.death / b.population AS "mortality"
FROM covid19 a, population b
WHERE
  a.country_name = '$country' AND
  a.country_code = b.country_code AND
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  a.country_name AS "Country",
  a.death / b.population AS "mortality"
FROM covid19 a, population b
WHERE
  a.country_code in ('BE', 'US', 'NL', 'MY', 'DE', 'FR', 'IT', 'ES') AND
  a.country_code = b.country_code AND
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1
